title: [Suggestion] Random skins in ARAM
body:
I play ARAM only.  I'd like to buy skins, but because ARAM is random I don't really want to spend money on a champ I might only play once a month.  I think it'd be great if you could buy something specific to ARAM where you are given the option of one random skin every time you play.  That way I could have variety in appearance without spending a thousand dollars.

I realise there are boosts, but that's a pretty expensive way to do it in the long run.

What do you guys think?

replies.body:
I'd much rather see ARAM actually become RANDOM first.

All champs should be unlocked in ARAM to prevent the horrible existence of ARAM Accounts that get Lux 90% of the time because it's the only champ the own.
I still don't understand why people have ARAM only accounts, seems boring to me.
It's not as big a commitment.  More densly packed fun.

if you think ARAM isn't a commitment, you are doing it wrong, because all games are commitments, it's just a shorter time span.

If you have fun playing the same few champions, you are doing it wrong by going into an ARAM.
Ok but that's a different issue than the one I raised.  Do you like my idea?
